name: HACKSLASH
description:
Music Composer: (HellSnake) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0x8PKCDaEAn7ntG6qO1-OQ/

Sounds: https://www.zapsplat.com/

A samurai that just wants to kick some ass, play this game if you want to be badass yourself!

Controls are a little difficult to get used to but I've made sure to include some instructions when you start the game.
